title: Lessons on Seduction
description: Sapphire Blake never imagined her fresh start in college would lead her into the arms of Julian Richland—a dangerously irresistible bad boy with a dark past. Known for his heart-stopping looks and playboy reputation, Julian is the man every woman desires, but no one can tame.When their worlds collide, Sapphire is swept into a whirlwind of passion and peril, where every intimate moment brings her closer to the truth Julian hides. As she uncovers the secrets of his double life, powerful enemies emerge, threatening to tear them apart.In this sizzling tale of forbidden love, Sapphire must decide if her feelings for Julian are worth risking everything—or if this player is too dangerous to love. Perfect for fans of steamy romance with a dark twist, Lessons on Seduction will leave you breathless and craving more.
author: Estelle Pettersen
